data.title: Tom Hanks And Wife Rita Wilson Have A Romantic Vacation In Greece
data.meta_description: Tom Hanks and his wife, Rita Wilson were spotted enjoying a holiday in Greece on Sunday.Â Read on to hear more about it!
data.text:
Tom Hanks and his wife, Rita Wilson were spotted enjoying a holiday in Greece on Sunday. Read on to hear more about it!

Article continues below advertisement

The couple took a stroll along the rocks and soaked up some Mediterranean sun.

Article continues below advertisement

After taking a walk, the pair went yachting in Poseidon's sea; sipping cocktails and nibbling on seaside snacks.

Article continues below advertisement

Tom and Rita were staying in Antiparos, Greece, a popular celebrity tourist destination. Actors Woody Harrelson and Matthew McConaughey were recently seen there as well. Maybe they caught up with each other!

MORE ON:

Tom Hanks

Tom Hanks and Rita Wilson's L.A. Home Burglarized by Thieves Who Smashed Through Glass to Get Inside Guest House

Tom and Chet Hanks' Relationship: Their Ups and Downs Explained in 10 Clicks

Tom Hanks' Son Chet Admits He Grew Up Feeling 'Completely Worthless': 'A Lot to Mentally Process'

Article continues below advertisement

Rita is a native of Greece and is very open about her Greek Orthodox faith. Tom even converted to the religion for her when they got married over 30 years ago. The couple met on set of the tv series Bosom Buddies in 1980 and have two sons.

Article continues below advertisement

The actors' production company, Playtone even produced famed Greek-centric movies, My Life in Ruins, My Big Fat Greek Wedding and its sequel; the latter in which Rita co-starred in.

Do you want see Tom and Rita star in a movie together? Let us know what you think in the comments below.
